dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, wait, uh, people just couldn't use their phones at all? Like, completely?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, wait, uh, people just couldn't use their phones at all? Like, completely?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, not exactly their phones, per se, but, um, specific services on their network were, you know, having issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, not exactly their phones, per se, but, um, specific services on their network were, you know, having issues.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There were temporary disruptions in some services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. So, like, what kind of services were, uh, actually broken?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So, like, what kind of services were, uh, actually broken?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Mostly their website and, uh, their app. That's what we heard from the reports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mostly their website and, uh, their app. That's what we heard from the reports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to our readers, Altel's website and app were not functioning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Altel website? And the Altel app? Is that right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Altel website? And the Altel app? Is that right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, what did that actually do? Like, what was the real problem for people?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, what did that actually do? Like, what was the real problem for people?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The biggest thing was, like, SMS codes. People just couldn't get them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The biggest thing was, like, S M S codes. People just couldn't get them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: registering in certain applications, such as banking apps, required an SMS code, but receiving it was impossible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: SMS codes? You mean, for like, uh, banking apps, stuff like that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: S M S codes? You mean, for like, uh, banking apps, stuff like that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! Banking, registering in other apps, anything that needed that confirmation code, it was just impossible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! Banking, registering in other apps, anything that needed that confirmation code, it was just impossible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: registering in certain applications, such as banking apps, required an SMS code, but receiving it was impossible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So they couldn't, like, log in or do important things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So they couldn't, like, log in or do important things.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, paying for public transport via SMS was also totally out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, paying for public transport via S M S was also totally out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, customers of the operator were unable to pay for public transport via SMS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Public transport? That's, uh, that's really inconvenient, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Public transport? That's, uh, that's really inconvenient, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it definitely was. A huge hassle for a lot of people, I'd imagine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it definitely was. A huge hassle for a lot of people, I'd imagine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Altel, like, what did they actually say about all this, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Altel, like, what did they actually say about all this, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They, uh, they called them "temporary disruptions."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They, uh, they called them temporary disruptions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "There were temporary disruptions in some services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Temporary. And it's, like, all fixed now, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temporary. And it's, like, all fixed now, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, they've stated that all services have been, uh, restored now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, they've stated that all services have been, uh, restored now.
